content.question: Which of the following is a negative consequence of aquaculture?

choices.label: Protein-rich food is provided to billions of people.
Pressure on wild fish populations is reduced.
Excessive amounts of nitrogen and phosphorus can leak from the location.
Other species (by-catch) may be accidentally removed during harvest

content.answer: Excessive amounts of nitrogen and phosphorus can leak from the location.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
